question:
The UN DESA released the International Migrant Stock, 2019 report. In this context, consider the following statements:
  1. India is the top source of immigrants in the world.
  2. The number of migrants living in India has increased.
  3. USA hosts the highest number of immigrants.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Statement 1 is correct: The UN Department of Economic and Social Affairs released a report saying that largest portion of international immigrants originate from India. About 17.5 million people emigrated from India. UAE and USA are the major destinations of Indian immigrants. 1/3rd of the international immigrants were sourced from just 10 countries. Statement 2 is incorrect: The number of migrants living in India has declined according to the report. These immigrants are mostly from Bangladesh. The proportion of migrants has remained at 0.4% of population but the numbers have fallen from 5.24 million in 2015 to 5.15 million in 2019. Statement 3 is correct: USA hosts the largest number of emigrants in the world. It has about 51 million migrants which is about 19% of the global population. Continent-wise, Europe hosts the most number of migrants followed by North America. Northern Africa and West Asia hold the next largest migrant populations.
